name: INUIAddVoiceShortcutViewControllerDelegate
desc: The protocol an object implements to receive notifications from the view controller adding a shortcut to Siri.

items.name: func addVoiceShortcutViewController(INUIAddVoiceShortcutViewController, didFinishWith: INVoiceShortcut?, error: Error?)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the view controller added the shortcut to Siri.

items.name: func addVoiceShortcutViewControllerDidCancel(INUIAddVoiceShortcutViewController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate the user canceled the add-to-Siri process.
